name: Vancouver Child Kicker: The Game
description:
This is a fan made game of the F**kface podcast based on episode 39: We're Still in the Past // Vancouver Child Kicker.

This game attempts to capture the stress and panic experienced by Andrew Panton on a night where he was followed by a child who was potentially a zombie or demon of some kind.

Objective: walk as far right as possible.

How to play:

- A / Left arrow: go left

- D / Right arrow: go right

- spacebar / left click: kick

- P: pause game

You have 3 lives. Don't get attacked by evil children, and don't kick innocent ones.

Tweet screenshots of your high scores at me @michaelprobst7on twitter. I'll pin the highest score on my profile. Also, leave comments down below for feedback on the game :)
